attr.title: Super Raft Boat Classic
attr.desc: The world's been flooded, and all you have is your Super Raft Boat. You keep sailing, hoping to find an island while fighting off the creatures of the sea. From the Clear Skies to the Sea of the Damned, can you reach The Final Island?
attr.inst:
Claim the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1541250/Super_Raft_Boat_Classic/

Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1541250 1541251 4671292693324189046 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy all files from the download folder to /ports/superraftboatclassic/gamedata

Note: Requires Twin Sticks. Also, when you have unlocked an item, hold L2/R2 and use the D-pad to move the mouse. Let go over Continue and you will be able to get past the unlock screen
